actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Concurrent resolution relative to the elimination of illegal drug traffic from Turkey.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the President should convene the National Security Council in order to devise a viable strategy for combating the smuggling of opium and heroin from Turkey. Directs that a strategy report be submitted to Congress. Calls for the immediate suspension of all foreign assistance to Turkey until that government implements adequate controls to prevent smuggling into the U.S. of Turkish-grown or processed opium and heroin.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution relative to the elimination of illegal drug traffic from Turkey.
